review: This is my second Fire TV Stick. I received the first one as a gift. The second one I ordered for my husband . We both really like how easy it is to use.
author: Cheryl Cole

review: If I could I would give zero stars. I tried for 2 hours to try to get this to work. Finally gave up!!! Worst product ever!!! Don't bother with this!!!
author: Henry Mech

review: Buy it!!!!! Instant access to thousands of free movies and tv shows. Love this.
author: Pam Chaney

review: Unfortunately I have not read some reviews about the product before buying it and it just does not connect with my internet. In fact it connects, informs that the signal is good and suddenly disconnects again becoming impossible to watch anything. Worthless !!!
author: BETOBARONTO

review: It's really a great little stick when coupled with Amazon Prime !!!
author: Gil Miracle

review: Love our firestick! Works great. Way better than the chrome cast.
author: The Magic Man
